chunks.content: During this time, Beyoncé recorded a duet with Marc Nelson, an original member of Boyz II Men, on the song 'After All Is Said and Done' for the soundtrack to the 1999 film, The Best Man.

metadata.relevance_reason: This part directly answers the question by stating who Beyoncé recorded with for the movie 'The Best Man'.
metadata.answer_contribution: Identifies Marc Nelson as the artist Beyoncé recorded with for the movie.
